mapper.select: select distinct CUST_NO, ORGANIZATION_CODE, GOVERNMENT_PLATFORM, CUST_NAME_CN, CUST_NAME_EN, CUST_ADDRESS_CN, CUST_ADDRESS_EN, CUST_BUSINESS_UNIT, CUST_REG_TYPE, CUST_RCREDIT_TYPE, CUST_SCALE, GROUP_NO, GROUP_NAME, MAIN_BUSINESS, CUST_COUNTRY, CREDIT_RATING, RATING_TIME, CUST_MANAGER from BIZ_CUSTOMER order by CUST_NO asc
